verses.verse: When Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> had spoken <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5631><s%> these words <S%G5023><s%>, he went forth <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> over <S%G4008><s%> the brook <S%G5493><s%> Cedron <S%G2748><s%>, where <S%G3699><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> a garden <S%G2779><s%>, into <S%G1519><s%> the which <S%G3739><s%> he <S%G846><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Y'hudah <S%G2455><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> betrayed <S%G3860><s%> <S%G5723><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, knew <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5715><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> ofttimes <S%G4178><s%> resorted <S%G4863><s%> <S%G5681><s%> thither <S%G1563><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>.

Y'hudah <S%G2455><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>, having received <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5631><s%> a band <S%G4686><s%> of men and <S%G2532><s%> officers <S%G5257><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the chief Kohanim <S%G749><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> P'rushim <S%G5330><s%>, cometh <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%> thither <S%G1563><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> lanterns <S%G5322><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> torches <S%G2985><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> weapons <S%G3696><s%>.

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%>, knowing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5761><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> that should come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5740><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, went forth <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Whom <S%G5101><s%> seek ye <S%G2212><s%> <S%G5719><s%>?

They answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> of Natzeret <S%G3480><s%>. Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> <S%G5748><s%> he. And <S%G1161><s%> Y'hudah <S%G2455><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> betrayed <S%G3860><s%> <S%G5723><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, stood <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5715><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

As soon <S%G5613><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> as he had said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> <S%G5748><s%> he, they went <S%G565><s%> <S%G5627><s%> backward <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3694><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to the ground <S%G5476><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> asked he <S%G1905><s%> <S%G5656><s%> them <S%G846><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, Whom <S%G5101><s%> seek ye <S%G2212><s%> <S%G5719><s%>? And <S%G1161><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> of Natzeret <S%G3480><s%>.

That <S%G2443><s%> the saying <S%G3056><s%> might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5686><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> he spake <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> thou gavest <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5758><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> have I <S%G3756><s%> lost <S%G622><s%> <S%G5656><s%> none <S%G3762><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> SHim`on <S%G4613><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> a sword <S%G3162><s%> drew <S%G1670><s%> <S%G5656><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> smote <S%G3817><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the Kohen HaGodol's <S%G749><s%> servant <S%G1401><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> cut off <S%G609><s%> <S%G5656><s%> his <S%G846><s%> right <S%G1188><s%> ear <S%G5621><s%>. <S%G1161><s%> The servant's <S%G1401><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> Melekh <S%G3124><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> unto Kefa <S%G4074><s%>, Put up <S%G906><s%> <S%G5628><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> sword <S%G3162><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sheath <S%G2336><s%>: the cup <S%G4221><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> my Father <S%G3962><s%> hath given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5758><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>, shall I <S%G4095><s%> not <S%G3378><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> <S%G5632><s%> it <S%G846><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> led <S%G520><s%> him <S%G846><s%> away <S%G520><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Annas <S%G452><s%> first <S%G4412><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> father in Torah <S%G3995><s%> to Kayafa <S%G2533><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> the Kohen HaGodol <S%G749><s%> that same <S%G1565><s%> year <S%G1763><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> Kayafa <S%G2533><s%> was he <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> gave counsel <S%G4823><s%> <S%G5660><s%> to the Jews <S%G2453><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> it was expedient <S%G4851><s%> <S%G5719><s%> that one <S%G1520><s%> man <S%G444><s%> should die <S%G622><s%> <S%G5641><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> SHim`on <S%G4613><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> <S%G5707><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> so did another <S%G243><s%> Talmid <S%G3101><s%>: <S%G1161><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> Talmid <S%G3101><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> known <S%G1110><s%> unto the Kohen HaGodol <S%G749><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> went in with <S%G4897><s%> <S%G5627><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the palace <S%G833><s%> of the Kohen HaGodol <S%G749><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5715><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%> without <S%G1854><s%>. Then <S%G3767><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> that other <S%G243><s%> Talmid <S%G3101><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> known <S%G1110><s%> unto the Kohen HaGodol <S%G749><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> spake <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto her that kept the door <S%G2377><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> brought in <S%G1521><s%> <S%G5627><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the damsel <S%G3814><s%> that kept the door <S%G2377><s%> unto Kefa <S%G4074><s%>, Art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> one of <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> man's <S%G444><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>? He <S%G1565><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, I am <S%G1510><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> officers <S%G5257><s%> stood there <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5715><s%>, who had made <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5761><s%> a fire of coals <S%G439><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> cold <S%G5592><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they warmed themselves <S%G2328><s%> <S%G5711><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%> stood <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5761><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> warmed himself <S%G2328><s%> <S%G5734><s%>.

The Kohen HaGodol <S%G749><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> asked <S%G2065><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> doctrine <S%G1322><s%>.

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5656><s%> openly <S%G3954><s%> to the world <S%G2889><s%>; I <S%G1473><s%> ever <S%G3842><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5656><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>, whither <S%G3699><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> resort <S%G4905><s%> <S%G5736><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> secret <S%G2927><s%> have I said <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5656><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%>.

Why <S%G5101><s%> askest thou <S%G1905><s%> <S%G5719><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>? ask <S%G1905><s%> <S%G5657><s%> them which heard me <S%G191><s%> <S%G5756><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> I have said <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>: behold <S%G2396><s%>, they <S%G3778><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5758><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>.

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> I have spoken <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5656><s%> evil <S%G2560><s%>, bear witness <S%G3140><s%> <S%G5657><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the evil <S%G2556><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> well <S%G2573><s%>, why <S%G5101><s%> smitest <S%G1194><s%> <S%G5719><s%> thou me <S%G3165><s%>?
Now Annas <S%G452><s%> had sent <S%G649><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%> bound <S%G1210><s%> <S%G5772><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> Kayafa <S%G2533><s%> the Kohen HaGodol <S%G749><s%>.

One <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> of the Kohen HaGodol <S%G749><s%>, being <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> his kinsman <S%G4773><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> ear <S%G5621><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%> cut off <S%G609><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, Did <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the garden <S%G2779><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%>?
Kefa <S%G4074><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> denied <S%G720><s%> <S%G5662><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> the cock <S%G220><s%> crew <S%G5455><s%> <S%G5656><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> led they <S%G71><s%> <S%G5719><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Kayafa <S%G2533><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the hall of judgment <S%G4232><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> early <S%G4405><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they themselves <S%G846><s%> went <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5627><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the judgment hall <S%G4232><s%>, lest <S%G3363><s%> they should be defiled <S%G3392><s%> <S%G5686><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they might eat <S%G5315><s%> <S%G5632><s%> the passover <S%G3957><s%>.

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> accusation <S%G2724><s%> bring ye <S%G5342><s%> <S%G5719><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> man <S%G444><s%>?

They answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, If <S%G1508><s%> he <S%G3778><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> not <S%G1508><s%> a malefactor <S%G2555><s%>, we would <S%G302><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> have delivered <S%G3860><s%> him <S%G846><s%> up <S%G3860><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Take <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5628><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> <S%G5657><s%> him <S%G846><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to your <S%G5216><s%> Torah <S%G3551><s%>. The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, It is <S%G1832><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> Torahful <S%G1832><s%> <S%G5748><s%> for us <S%G2254><s%> to put <S%G615><s%> any man <S%G3762><s%> to death <S%G615><s%> <S%G5658><s%>:

That <S%G2443><s%> the saying <S%G3056><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5686><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> he spake <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, signifying <S%G4591><s%> <S%G5723><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> he should <S%G3195><s%> <S%G5707><s%> die <S%G599><s%> <S%G5721><s%>.

Then <S%G3767><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5627><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the judgment hall <S%G4232><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> called <S%G5455><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G5748><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> the King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%>?

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, Sayest <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> this thing <S%G5124><s%> of <S%G575><s%> thyself <S%G1438><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> did others <S%G243><s%> tell it <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>?

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%>, <S%G3385><s%> Am <S%G1510><s%> <S%G5748><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> a Jew <S%G2453><s%>? Thine own <S%G4674><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the chief Kohanim <S%G749><s%> have delivered <S%G3860><s%> <S%G5656><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> unto me <S%G1698><s%>: what <S%G5101><s%> hast thou done <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5656><s%>?

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5662><s%>, My <S%G1699><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%>: if <S%G1487><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%>, then would <S%G302><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> servants <S%G5257><s%> fight <S%G75><s%> <S%G5711><s%>, that <S%G3363><s%> I should <S%G3860><s%> not <S%G3363><s%> be delivered <S%G3860><s%> <S%G5686><s%> to the Jews <S%G2453><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> from hence <S%G1782><s%>.
